Player History
Injured on 6/15/2013 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/7/2013, off Kyle Bellamy (CHW)...
Traded from Detroit to Chicago (N) on 2/20/2014 (Going to CHC: P Justin Verlander, RF Nick Castellanos, CF Austin Schotts. Going to DET: 1B Anthony Rizzo, SS Asdrubal Cabrera)...
Injured on 4/6/2014 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/9/2014 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 8/24/2015, off Starlin Peralta (ARI)...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 2016...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 4/21/2017.
Injured on 7/1/2017 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/31/2018 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...

1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2020, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,785,714 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2021, hitting .520 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 5/20/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
9/21/2021: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $15,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with Seattle in 2021...
Injured on 6/30/2022 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 9/3/2022...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Oakland on 9/22/2022...
Injured on 9/24/2022 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Won World Series with Seattle in 2022...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $2,570,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2024, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 2/3/2026 to a 2-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2026, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Texas on 1/31/2027 (Going to TEX: P Malik Machado, RF Nick Castellanos, CF Elier Hernandez, P Aaron Sanchez, 1B Pedro Altamirano. Going to TB: P Allen Quigley, C Perry Vi
llanveva)...
8/1/2027: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $860,000 per year, for 2 years.
Released by Texas on 5/22/2029...
